engine_horse_power, drive_model, gearbox, seat_number, configure, exterior_color, official_guide_price, announcement_type, whole_curb_weight, wheel_base, car_body_length, car_body_width, car_body_height, carriage_length, carriage_width, carriage_height, seat_arrangement, tonnage_level, vehicle_body_structure, sunroof,open_sunroof, electric_adjust_seat, leather_seat, car_body_stedy_control, headlamp_type, navigation_system, cruise_control, park_distance_control, automatic_air_conditioner, multifunction_steer_wheel, create_time, update_time) values (#{vehicleBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleModelYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.select: SELECT * FROM car_info WHERE 1 ORDER BY id LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
